template: Among [Player]â€™s club teammates when he was 28 years old, which ones shared the same nationality as him?
description: Requires identifying the target player's club affiliation at a specific age, retrieving all teammates from that club and season, determining the nationality of each teammate, and comparing it with the player's nationality to select those that match.
essential_tool_calls: [SQL Execute/Lotus] SELECT name FROM players WHERE nation = [nation] / {player}'s nationality is [nation]
